ratings.comment: Just the kindest and most compassionate professor. Fair assignments I actually really enjoyed. Know though that many are group projects. Ended up loving this class! Even got to see his dog Mabel :)

Greg is truly here to teach us, which sadly can't be said of all professors. OTM 714 uses R coding. I almost failed a comp sci class in high school, and don't deal well w/ certain CS teaching styles. But so far (1/2 way thru) things are great! He's not trying to trick us or weed out those who can't learn coding w/o being taught in traditional ways.

Greg is light hearted, genuine, and approachable. While I wish the course itself focused less on R, and more on Tableau/PowerBI or Excel, he is an excellent teacher that tries to make class a good mix of learning and fun. Must go to class as files are submitted as participation.

Greg is a really positive professor and is always excited about the material. The class is very lecture-focused, but Greg provides a lot of opportunities for students to participate and ask questions in class. Greg is also very approachable and available for questions outside of class.
